front.title: Identity-Based Cryptography Standard (IBCS) #1: Supersingular Curve Implementations of the BF and BB1 Cryptosystems

abstract.t: This document describes the algorithms that implement Boneh-Franklin and Boneh-Boyen Identity-based Encryption. This document is in part based on IBCS #1 v2 of Voltage Securityâ€™s Identity-based Cryptography Standards (IBCS) documents.
